titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on NMSBA.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/18/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, from December 31, 2003, through December 31, 2004, the duty on 4-(Methylsulfonyl)-2-nitrobenzoic acid (NMSBA). Increases the duty on such chemical from December 31, 2005, through December 31, 2007.
